name: laptop
description: Powerful laptop with a quad-core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and a 14-inch FHD display.

name: smartphone
description: Sleek smartphone with a 6.1-inch OLED display, 128GB storage, and a 12MP dual camera system.

name: tablet
description: Compact tablet with a 10.5-inch display, 64GB storage, and 4GB RAM, perfect for on-the-go use.

name: smartwatch
description: Stylish smartwatch with fitness tracking, heart rate monitor, and 5-day battery life.

name: headphones
description: Wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 20-hour battery life.

name: camera
description: High-resolution camera with 24MP sensor, 4K video recording, and interchangeable lenses.

name: printer
description: All-in-one printer with wireless connectivity, duplex printing, and high-quality photo printing.

name: gaming console
description: Next-gen gaming console with 4K gaming, 1TB storage, and a vast library of exclusive games.

name: router
description: High-speed router with dual-band WiFi, advanced security features, and easy setup.

name: monitor
description: 24-inch FHD monitor with slim design, IPS panel, and multiple connectivity options.
